name: Alice's Escape from Wonderland
description:
Everyone always dreams of exploring a magical world of wonders. Of meeting new and interesting people and creatures as you wonder. But those adventures are a lot less fun when you're being hunted by a monster.

Play as Alice as she journeys across Wonderland with the Cheshire cat, looking to escape the claws of the Jabberwockie. Talk with the different residents and answer their riddles. But be careful, one wrong answer can give your hunter the time to bounce. Fight back through the barrage of attacks as your thrown into bullet-hell segments to escape the monster's clutches.
